welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kingman, a charming city known for its small town feel and scenic desert landscapes. Take some time to explore and immerse yourself in all the beauty and history this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kingman Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kingman Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free wifi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Laughlin Bullhead International Airport serves commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants and shops.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Laughlin Bullhead International Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
